mapper.insert: insert into basic_loginlog (pkid, loginmodule, loginip, userid, username, createtime, status, remark) values (#{pkid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{loginmodule,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update basic_loginlog set loginmodule = #{loginmodule,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, loginip = #{loginip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userid = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where pkid = #{pkid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select pkid, loginmodule, loginip, userid, username, createtime, status, remark from basic_loginlog
mapper.delete: delete from basic_loginlog where createtime < DATE_SUB(now(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
